description:
maximum collector current at which the collector-emitter and base-emitter saturation voltages of a switching bipolar transistor are given at specified dc saturation current gain and ambient temperature.
At I_Csat the switching properties should also be characterised in a resistive circuit (t_d, t_r, t_s and t_f) using the same value for +I_B and -I_B as the base current used for V_Cesat and V_Besat.
